Charles G. Case et al., appellees, v. The United States, appellants. On the defendants' Appeal. This case was tried at the same time with. that of Case &. Van Wagoner (11 0. 01s. 11., 712), and the questions ineolml were understood to be substantially the same. The judgement- of (lie court below is affirmed without an opinion being -> delivered. The Reporters' .statement of the case: As no opinion was delivered by either court in this case, no syllabus can bo supplied. The Chiep Justice

announced the decision of the Supreme Court, affirming; the judgment of the court below, April 21, 1879.
